name: Lonely Bell Sound
description:
A minimalistic adventure, where you, the player, will use the power of sound to see the world around you.

Where did the sun go?

It went into darkness, held by the hands of an angel.

Help us, friend.

Help us! Return the sun back!

You have the magic bell, the bell that will save us all!

Be sure not to leave us alone in the darkness, you are the only hope...
